NOTES: This show was something that I wanted to work on for years, even before I started the SushiKushi group.
Originally, it was supposed to be the first upload on various P2P outlets, but then it got pushed back due to some anime shows
that had to be worked on. But, finally the wait is over. Worked on this for 3 days, had to encode all sub and dub versions
in 1080p and 720p HD quality. To be honest, this is one of my favorite shows and I think that you guys should watch it!
Now that I'm done with that, I am now going to be working on Black Butler, Clannad, Red Data Girl, and some other stuff for
you guys! Special thanks to Sachi who worked on the subtitles, Doki for the subtitles, and also Octane for getting this Blu-Ray!
Feel free to follow SushiKushi on twitter @sushi_kopimi! Thank you all for downloading this AnimeRG-DushiKushi release! :)[/center]
